00044 namespace sc_core {
00045 
00046 class sc_event;
00047 class sc_port_base;
00048 class sc_interface;
00049 class sc_event_finder;
00050 class sc_process_b;
00051 class sc_spawn_reset_base;

00054 //=============================================================================
00055 // CLASS sc_spawn_options
00056 //
00057 //=============================================================================
00058 class SC_API sc_spawn_options {
00059     friend class sc_cthread_process;
00060     friend class sc_method_process;
00061     friend class sc_process_b;
00062     friend class sc_thread_process;
00063   public:
00064     sc_spawn_options() :                  
00065         m_dont_initialize(false), m_resets(), m_sensitive_events(),
00066         m_sensitive_event_finders(), m_sensitive_interfaces(),
00067         m_sensitive_port_bases(), m_spawn_method(false), m_stack_size(0)
00068         { }
00069 
00070     ~sc_spawn_options();
00071 
00072     void async_reset_signal_is( const sc_in<bool>&,           bool level );
00073     void async_reset_signal_is( const sc_inout<bool>&,        bool level );
00074     void async_reset_signal_is( const sc_out<bool>&,          bool level );
00075     void async_reset_signal_is( const sc_signal_in_if<bool>&, bool level );
00076 
00077     void reset_signal_is( const sc_in<bool>&,           bool level );
00078     void reset_signal_is( const sc_inout<bool>&,        bool level );
00079     void reset_signal_is( const sc_out<bool>&,          bool level );
00080     void reset_signal_is( const sc_signal_in_if<bool>&, bool level );
00081 
00082     void dont_initialize()   { m_dont_initialize = true; }
00083 
00084     bool is_method() const   { return m_spawn_method; }
00085 
00086     void set_stack_size(int stack_size) { m_stack_size = stack_size; }
00087 
00088     void set_sensitivity(const sc_event* event) 
00089         { m_sensitive_events.push_back(event); }
00090 
00091     void set_sensitivity(sc_port_base* port_base)
00092         { m_sensitive_port_bases.push_back(port_base); }
00093 
00094     void set_sensitivity(sc_interface* interface_p) 
00095         { m_sensitive_interfaces.push_back(interface_p); }
00096 
00097     void set_sensitivity(sc_export_base* export_base) 
00098         { m_sensitive_interfaces.push_back(export_base->get_interface()); }
00099 
00100     void set_sensitivity(sc_event_finder* event_finder) 
00101         { m_sensitive_event_finders.push_back(event_finder); }
00102 
00103     void spawn_method()                 { m_spawn_method = true; }
00104 
00105   protected:
00106     void specify_resets() const;
00107 
00108   private:
00109     sc_spawn_options( const sc_spawn_options& );
00110     const sc_spawn_options& operator = ( const sc_spawn_options& );
00111 
00112   protected:
00113     bool                               m_dont_initialize;         
00114     std::vector<sc_spawn_reset_base*>  m_resets;
00115     std::vector<const sc_event*>       m_sensitive_events;
00116     std::vector<sc_event_finder*>      m_sensitive_event_finders; 
00117     std::vector<sc_interface*>         m_sensitive_interfaces;
00118     std::vector<sc_port_base*>         m_sensitive_port_bases;
00119     bool                               m_spawn_method; // Method not thread.
00120     int                                m_stack_size;   // Thread stack size.
00121 };
00122 
00123 } // namespace sc_core
